jobs:
  backend_pipeline:
    name: Backend Pipeline
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: ./backend
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install
      - name: Lint
        run: npm run lint

     #   run: npm test
